OOC:( Yes, Battera has such a device still on her. CyberShark gave it 
to her when he first met her.  So she would be able to enter the 
Destron base and not get fired on by the autoguns.  But Battera is at 
the Cybertron Fire.  She knows nothing of the activities at the 
Destron base at this point.  She only visited the base for a brief 
time anyway.  But she still has that device on her. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> The only way his bomb could pass detection was if it had a Destron 
signal, and only one of extreme importance, the Virus I decided to 
wipe out the computer system, a fail safe kicked in, and the new 
computer doesn't recognize any signals, Destron or otherwise, it will 
shoot everything, it assessed that if It shot the bomb it would bring 
harm to the ship, it can't allow that to happen, so it ejected it, 
where it goes is up to Earth2025. The only bot that can enter the 
ship is Shredder, because Magmatron gave him a device so the 
computers would recognize him as a Destron, actually, I believe 
Battera still has one.
